mapper.select: SELECT distinct year, semester FROM subject ORDER BY year desc, semester asc; -- 수강년도는 내림차순, 학기는 오름차순으로 조회
SELECT A.code,A.subjectNO,A.professor FROM subject A JOIN schedule B ON B.email=#{email} AND A.year=#{year} AND A.semester=#{semester};
SELECT * FROM subject where year=#{year} and semester=#{semester};
